Typealiases.html#/s:11XMLWrangler32XMLAt.name: XMLAttributeContentRepresentable
Typealiases.html#/s:11XMLWrangler32XMLAt.abstract: Describes a type that can be converted from and to an XMLElement.Attributes.Content instance.

Typealiases.html#/s:11XMLWrangler23XMLEl.name: XMLElementRepresentable
Typealiases.html#/s:11XMLWrangler23XMLEl.abstract: A type that can be converted from and to an XMLElement.

Structs/XMLElement/Name.html#/s:11XMLWra.name: init(_:)
Structs/XMLElement/Name.html#/s:11XMLWra.abstract: Creates a new name using the given raw value.

Structs/XMLElement/Content/StringInterpo.name: appendLiteral(_:)
Structs/XMLElement/Content/StringInterpo.abstract: Appends a literal to the contents by simply adding a .string element with the literal’s contents.

Structs/XMLElement/Content/StringInterpo.name: appendInterpolation(_:)
Structs/XMLElement/Content/StringInterpo.abstract: Appends a string element to the contents.

Structs/XMLElement/Content/StringInterpo.name: appendInterpolation(_:)
Structs/XMLElement/Content/StringInterpo.abstract: Appends the XMLElement of a XMLElementConvertible type to the contents.

Structs/XMLElement/Content/StringInterpo.name: appendInterpolation(_:)
Structs/XMLElement/Content/StringInterpo.abstract: Appends the contents of another sequence of XMLElement.Content.Element to the contents.

Structs/XMLElement/Content/StringInterpo.name: appendInterpolation(_:)
Structs/XMLElement/Content/StringInterpo.abstract: Appends a variadic list of XMLElement.Content.Element to the contents.

Structs/XMLElement/Content/Element.html#.name: StringPart
Structs/XMLElement/Content/Element.html#.abstract: The type used to represent a string content.

Structs/XMLElement/Content.html#/s:11XML.name: allElements
Structs/XMLElement/Content.html#/s:11XML.abstract: Returns the elements of all .element(_)s in the receiver.

Structs/XMLElement/Content.html#/s:11XML.name: allStrings
Structs/XMLElement/Content.html#/s:11XML.abstract: Returns the strings of all .string(_)s in the receiver.

Structs/XMLElement/Content.html#/s:11XML.name: find(elementsNamed:recursive:)
Structs/XMLElement/Content.html#/s:11XML.abstract: Searches for elements with a given name. Optionally also recursive.

Structs/XMLElement/Content.html#/s:11XML.name: findFirst(elementNamed:recursive:)
Structs/XMLElement/Content.html#/s:11XML.abstract: Finds the first occurence of an element with a given name.

Structs/XMLElement/Content.html#/s:11XML.name: findLast(elementNamed:recursive:)
Structs/XMLElement/Content.html#/s:11XML.abstract: Finds the last occurence of an element with a given name.

Structs/XMLElement/Content.html#/s:11XML.name: appendString(_:)
Structs/XMLElement/Content.html#/s:11XML.abstract: Appends either a new .string element, or if the last one is already .string, appends string to the last one.

Structs/XMLElement/Content.html#/s:11XML.name: append(string:)
Structs/XMLElement/Content.html#/s:11XML.abstract: Appends either a new .string element, or if the last one is already .string, appends string to the last one.

Structs/XMLElement/Content.html#/s:11XML.name: append(elementOf:)
Structs/XMLElement/Content.html#/s:11XML.abstract: Appends the xml element of a convertible type.

Structs/XMLElement/Content.html#/s:11XML.name: append(contentsOf:)
Structs/XMLElement/Content.html#/s:11XML.abstract: Appends the contents of a sequcence of elements wrapped as .element.

Structs/XMLElement/Content.html#/s:11XML.name: appendElements(_:)
Structs/XMLElement/Content.html#/s:11XML.abstract: Appends the one or more elements wrapped as .element.

Structs/XMLElement/Content.html#/s:11XML.name: append(elements:)
Structs/XMLElement/Content.html#/s:11XML.abstract: Appends the one or more elements wrapped as .element.

Structs/XMLElement/Content.html#/s:11XML.name: compressed()
Structs/XMLElement/Content.html#/s:11XML.abstract: Returns a compressed version of self, where all consecutive .string elements were merged into one.

Structs/XMLElement/Attributes/Content.ht.abstract: Creates a new key using the given raw value.

Structs/XMLElement/Attributes/Key.html#/.name: init(_:)
Structs/XMLElement/Attributes/Key.html#/.abstract: Creates a new key using the given raw value.

Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.name: keys
Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.abstract: Returns the keys of in this Attributes.

Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.name: contents
Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.abstract: Returns the contents of in this Attributes. The contents can be mutated.

Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.name: init()
Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.abstract: Creates an empty attributes list.

Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.name: init(minimumCapacity:)
Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.abstract: Creates an empty attributes list that reserves the given capacity.

Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.name: init(uniqueKeysWithContents:)

Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.name: init(_:uniquingKeysWith:)
Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.abstract: Creates an attributes list with the given keys and contents, using a closure for uniquing keys.

Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.name: subscript(_:)
Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.abstract: Returns / sets the content for the given key.

Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.name: subscript(_:default:)
Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.abstract: Returns / sets the content for the given key, using a default if the key does not exist.

Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.name: filter(_:)
Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.abstract: Filters the attributes using the given predicate closure.

Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.name: updateContent(_:forKey:)
Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.abstract: Updates the content element for a given key.

Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.name: removeContent(forKey:)
Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.abstract: Removes the content for a given key.

Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.name: merge(_:uniquingKeysWith:)
Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.abstract: Merges another sequence of key-content-pairs into the receiving attributes.

Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.name: merge(_:uniquingKeysWith:)
Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.abstract: Merges another attributes list into the receiving attributes.

Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.name: merging(_:uniquingKeysWith:)
Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.abstract: Returns the result of merging another sequence of key-content-pairs with the receiving attributes.

Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.name: merging(_:uniquingKeysWith:)
Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.abstract: Returns the result of merging another attributes list into the receiving attributes.

Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.name: removeAll(keepingCapacity:)
Structs/XMLElement/Attributes.html#/s:11.abstract: Removes all key-content pairs from the attributes.

Structs/XMLElement/Content.html.abstract: A collection implementation that represents the contents of an XML element.

Structs/XMLElement.html#/s:11XMLWrangler.name: element(at:)
Structs/XMLElement.html#/s:11XMLWrangler.abstract: Looks up a single child element at a given path of element names.

Structs/XMLElement.html#/s:11XMLWrangler.abstract: Looks up a single child element at a given path of element names.

Structs/XMLElement.html#/s:11XMLWrangler.abstract: Finds all element children with the given name inside the content the element on which this is called.

Structs/SerializationOptions.html#/s:11X.abstract: Use pretty formatting (by adding newlines between elements).

Structs/SerializationOptions.html#/s:11X.abstract: Use single quotes (‘) instead of double quotes (“) for attribute values.

Structs/SerializationOptions.html.name: SerializationOptions
Structs/SerializationOptions.html.abstract: Represents options to use for serializing XML elements.

Structs/XMLElement.html.name: XMLElement
Structs/XMLElement.html.abstract: Represents an element in an XML structure.

Protocols/ExpressibleByXMLElement.html#/.name: init(xml:)
Protocols/ExpressibleByXMLElement.html#/.abstract: Creates a new instance using the given XMLElement.

Protocols/ExpressibleByXMLAttributeConte.name: init(xmlAttributeContent:)
Protocols/ExpressibleByXMLAttributeConte.abstract: Creates a new instance of the conforming type using the given attribute content.

Protocols/XMLAttributeContentConvertible.name: XMLAttributeContentConvertible
Protocols/XMLAttributeContentConvertible.abstract: Describes a type that can turn itself into an XMLElement.Attributes.Content

Protocols/ExpressibleByXMLAttributeConte.name: ExpressibleByXMLAttributeContent
Protocols/ExpressibleByXMLAttributeConte.abstract: Describes a type that can be created from an XMLElement.Attributes.Content instance.

Protocols/ExpressibleByXMLElement.html.name: ExpressibleByXMLElement
Protocols/ExpressibleByXMLElement.html.abstract: Describes a type that can be initialized with an XMLElement.

Protocols/XMLElementConvertible.html.name: XMLElementConvertible
Protocols/XMLElementConvertible.html.abstract: Describes a type that can be converted to an XMLElement.

Extensions/Sequence.html#/s:ST11XMLWrang.name: converted(to:)

Extensions/Dictionary.html#/s:SD11XMLWra.name: init(elementsOf:)
Extensions/Dictionary.html#/s:SD11XMLWra.abstract: Initializes the dictionary using the storage of the given attributes.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS11XMLWrangle.name: escaped(content:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS11XMLWrangle.abstract: Returns a string which is escaped following the rules for the EscapableContent passed in.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS11XMLWrangle.name: escape(content:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS11XMLWrangle.abstract: Escapes the receiver following the rules for the EscapableContent passed in.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS11XMLWrangle.name: init(xmlDocumentRoot:version:encoding:options:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS11XMLWrangle.abstract: Creates a String by serializing an XML element as root and adding the <?xml …?> document header.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS11XMLWrangle.name: init(xmlDocumentRootWith:version:encoding:options:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS11XMLWrangle.abstract: Creates a String by serializing the XMLElement representation of the given convertible as root and adding the <?xml …?> document header.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS11XMLWrangle.name: init(xml:options:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS11XMLWrangle.abstract: Creates a String by serializing an XML element.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS11XMLWrangle.name: init(xmlOf:options:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS11XMLWrangle.abstract: Creates a String by serializing the XML element of the given XMLElementConvertible type.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS11XMLWrangle.name: init(xmlContent:options:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS11XMLWrangle.abstract: Creates a String by serializing an XML content.

Enums/EscapableContent/Quotes.html.name: Quotes
Enums/EscapableContent/Quotes.html.abstract: Represents the type of quotes to be used for quoting.

Enums/LookupError.html#/s:11XMLWrangler1.name: missingChild(element:childName:)
Enums/LookupError.html#/s:11XMLWrangler1.abstract: Thrown when a given element is missing a child with the given childName.

Enums/LookupError.html#/s:11XMLWrangler1.name: missingAttribute(element:key:)
Enums/LookupError.html#/s:11XMLWrangler1.abstract: Thrown when an element is missing an attribute for a given key.

Enums/LookupError.html#/s:11XMLWrangler1.name: cannotConvertAttribute(element:key:content:type:)
Enums/LookupError.html#/s:11XMLWrangler1.abstract: Thrown when an attribute content (for key) cannot be converted to a given type.

Enums/LookupError.html#/s:11XMLWrangler1.name: missingStringContent(element:)
Enums/LookupError.html#/s:11XMLWrangler1.abstract: Thrown when an element is missing string content.

Enums/LookupError.html#/s:11XMLWrangler1.name: cannotConvertStringContent(element:stringContent:type:)
Enums/LookupError.html#/s:11XMLWrangler1.abstract: Thrown when the stringContent of an element cannot be converted to a given type.

Enums/LookupError.html.name: LookupError
Enums/LookupError.html.abstract: The error type that is thrown for all lookup operations on XMLElement.

Enums/EscapableContent.html.name: EscapableContent
Enums/EscapableContent.html.abstract: Represents a type of content that can be escaped.

Classes/Parser.html#/s:11XMLWrangler6Par.name: init(data:)
Classes/Parser.html#/s:11XMLWrangler6Par.abstract: Creates a new instance using the given Data.

Classes/Parser.html#/s:11XMLWrangler6Par.name: init(string:)
Classes/Parser.html#/s:11XMLWrangler6Par.abstract: Creates a new instance using the given string.

Classes/Parser.html#/s:11XMLWrangler6Par.name: parse()
Classes/Parser.html#/s:11XMLWrangler6Par.abstract: Tries to parse the associated XML data. The parsing is only performed once.

Classes/Parser.html#/s:11XMLWrangler6Par.name: parseAndConvert(to:)
Classes/Parser.html#/s:11XMLWrangler6Par.abstract: Tries to parse the associated XML data and convert it to the given target by using it’s conformance to ExpressibleByXMLElement.

Classes/Parser/MissingRootElementError.h.name: MissingRootElementError
Classes/Parser/MissingRootElementError.h.abstract: Describes a failure that caused no element to be parsed.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
